text: The 3rd arrondissement of Paris (3^e arrondissement) is an administrative district in the city of Paris, France, located on the right bank of the River Seine.Paris : Histoire condensée du IIIème arrondissement, création, urbanisation, développement au coeur de la Capitale Known as the le troisième, it covers an area of 1.17 square kilometers and is home to approximately 32,772 residents.Anecdotes 3è arrondissement It houses the Musée des arts et métiers created in 1794.Musée des Arts et Métiers == Related pages == * Arrondissements of Paris == References == == Other websites == * Paris City Official Site Category:Arrondissements of France Category:Paris
title: 3rd arrondissement of Paris
